text: Marika Lagercrantz (1954) is a Swedish actress. she has appeared in a number of movies including The Girl With The Dragon Tattoo (2009), Gossip (2000), I Wonder Who's Kissing You Now (1999) and Dreaming of Rita (1993). ==References== Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:Swedish actors
title: Marika Lagercrantz
